INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT (FILE_NO,BOARD_NO,ORIGIN_NAME,CHANGE_NAME,FILE_PATH) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL,SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL,?,?,?)
UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = ?

SELECT BOARD_NO,USERNO,DECODE(BAM_CATEGORY_NO, '1', '일반', '2', '질문', '3', '연애', '4','공지') "BAM_CATEGORY_NO",BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT,CREATE_DATE,MODIFY_DATE,GOOD,COUNT FROM BOARD JOIN CATEGORY_BAM USING (BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FILE_NO,ORIGIN_NAME,CHANGE_NAME,FILE_PATH,UPLOAD_DATE FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = ? , BOARD_CONTENT = ? , MODIFY_DATE =SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE CATEGORY_BAM SET BAM_CATEGORY_NO = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? , CHANGE_NAME = ? , FILE_PATH = ? , UPLOAD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE FILE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO,BOARD_NO,ORIGIN_NAME,CHANGE_NAME,FILE_PATH) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?,?)
INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO,BOARD_NO,REPLY_CONTENT,USERNO) VALUES (SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?)
SELECT REPLY_NO,BOARD_NO,USERNO,REPLY_CONTENT,CREATE_DATE FROM REPLY WHERE BOARD_NO=? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE REPLY SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND REPLY_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET REPORT = REPORT+1 , STATUS = CASE WHEN (REPORT=10) THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
